title: With all the city, county and state budget shortfalls, why are plants and trees being planted on the Brunswick County approach to the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge? It seems someone picked the worst possible time to do this. If they wanted that area to look better, all that needed to be done was clean up the existing vegetation in the median - the scraggly trees and vines.
